UUI: Used as user provisioning tool for customer creation. 6. Splunk: All the component activity logs gets captured here 7. Storm: A tool via which we can access our STB (TV) situated at remote location (UK) 8. Bebanjo: Content publishing tool 9. Jira: used for tracking the scoped in stories for the releases and ticket raised for defects. 10. Wiki: Single source of information for scoped stories for releases and also we can find the design document for all programs and releases. 11. ALM: For tracking Test Execution and defects status 12. Execution Timeline for each Digital Apps area is as follows: 1. Sports App - Execution performed in Sprints. Timelines of each Sprint is 2 weeks, and each Sprint will have 1 or 2 App releases including Dot releases. 2. Sports Web - Every month there will be a new Dante release. Execution timelines will be for 1 to 2 weeks. And also there will be Ad-hoc releases in between. 3. CCP - For this there will be Ad-hoc releases Timelines depends on the Releases. 4. BT TV App and Web - 1 TV App release in a month for Phase 1 covering Web browsers, iOS and Android devices, also now testing involves Amazon Fire Tablet as well Testing of Phase 2 Large screen devices Samsung TV, Apple TV and Amazon Fire TV for Tech trial and Alpha trial.
